comments:
- Import two logs, and profile an application with all profiling options turned 
on (so you get class interactions, etc).
- In the log navigator, create a new correlation and open it in the log 
interactions view.
- Enable Link with Viewer.
- Switch to the Profiling Monitor.
- Select the profiling agent.
